patthana22.7:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:5.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:7.1_0: Nakusalaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:9.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:11.1_0: Nakusalaṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
